Why is Fossil Funding harmful for Banks? Are Green Bonds Increasing for a more Sustainable Financial System?

Bring Me Back: HOME

Aim: CO2 emission was reported by many journalist to decrease throughout the years. However for dacades, due to profitability over perceived risk many Banks refused to implement in Green funding.(Carbon Market Watch,2021) This led to Environmental, Social and Governence (ESG) to be enforced, which forces Banks to invest less in Fossil Fuel, especially in the UK. My objective is to evaluate the performace of Top Banks especially those in the UK according to their Market Capital, number of customer in relation to their funding on Fossi Fuel Over time. Further more, I will touch upon how UK is increasing Green Banking and their policies to go Green in the future.

The Issue
